articles.title: Giannis Antetokounmpo shrugs off sprained wrist: 'That was yesterday' - Milwaukee Journal Sentinel
articles.description: At the NBA All-star Celebrity Game, Giannis Antetokounmpo shrugged off his sprained wrist, an injury he suffered a day earlier against the Bulls.
